section-body.paragraph-text: Examples of places where the subject matter of this place is covered when specially adapted, used for a particular purpose, or incorporated in a larger system:

table-column.paragraph-text: Devices for producing mechanical power from geothermal energy

definition-item.definition-title: using underground reservoirs for accumulating working fluids or intermediate fluids

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Storing fluids in natural or artificial cavities or chambers in the earth

definition-item.definition-title: Geothermal systems (for producing mechanical power from geothermal energy F03G4/00)

table-column.paragraph-text: Devices for producing mechanical power from geothermal energy

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Permanently-installed heating devices of pavings of roads, playgrounds, sports grounds, airfields
Removing snow or ice from roads or like surfaces by application of heat
Mechanical-power-producing mechanisms using pressure differences or thermal differences occurring in nature not otherwise provided for
